title: Remote-controlled Pi Robot
description: This is my lil robot experiment called Elliot. I'm using a RPi 3B+ with an Explorer HAT. Elliot can be remote-controlled and is unlocked via a RFID sensor. The initial set-up is based on STS Pilot by Mark Dammer with a Python based Flask application for the Backend and JS/HTML/CSS for the remote Frontend. I'm planning to add some more sensors and play around with object detection.
